birth_place.zh-cn: 大清盛京将军辖区锦州府义县

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军政人物，奉系军阀核心人物之一。曾任吉林督军、吉林省政府主席等职。皇姑屯事件后，他拥立张学良继位，并推动东北易帜。
description.en: A military and political figure of the Republic of China, and a key figure in the Fengtian clique. He served as the Military Governor of Jilin and Chairman of the Jilin Provincial Government. After the Huanggutun Incident, he supported Zhang Xueliang as the successor and promoted the Northeast Flag Replacement.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国初期奉系军阀首领，北洋军阀中势力最大者之一，张学良之父。
description.en: The leader of the Fengtian clique in the early Republic of China, one of the most powerful warlords of the Beiyang government, and the father of Zhang Xueliang.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上对啸聚山林、拦路抢劫的盗匪的称呼，后泛指非官方的武装集团。
description.en: A term in Chinese history for bandits who gathered in forests and robbed travelers, later broadly referring to non-governmental armed groups.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上最后一个帝制王朝。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 晚清及北洋政府时代政治家，曾任中华民国大总统及东三省总督。
description.en: A politician during the late Qing Dynasty and Beiyang Government era, who served as President of the Republic of China and Governor-General of the Three Northeastern Provinces.

description.zh-cn: 清末民初在奉天设立的军事学校，为东北地区培养了大量军事人才。
description.en: A military school established in Fengtian during the late Qing and early Republican era, which trained a large number of military personnel for the Northeast region.

description.zh-cn: 奉系军阀创办的军事院校，是当时中国国内规模最大的军事院校之一。
description.en: A military academy founded by the Fengtian clique, it was one of the largest military academies in China at the time.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国奉系军阀将领。
description.en: A general of the Fengtian clique in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 辛亥革命后由部分清朝宗室、满蒙贵族等组织的政治团体，主张君主立宪，反对共和。
description.en: A political group formed by some members of the Qing imperial clan and Manchu-Mongol nobility after the Xinhai Revolution, advocating for a constitutional monarchy and opposing republicanism.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国奉系军阀将领。
description.en: A general of the Fengtian clique in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国奉系军阀将领。
description.en: A general of the Fengtian clique in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国将领，张作霖长子，奉系军阀的继承者，发动东北易帜和西安事变。
description.en: A general of the Republic of China, the eldest son of Zhang Zuolin, and the successor of the Fengtian clique, who initiated the Northeast Flag Replacement and the Xi'an Incident.

description.zh-cn: 1922年北洋军阀中直系与奉系之间爆发的战争。
description.en: A war that broke out in 1922 between the Zhili and Fengtian cliques of the Beiyang warlords.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国奉系军阀将领，后投靠日本，任满洲国总理大臣。
description.en: A general of the Fengtian clique in the Republic of China, who later collaborated with Japan and served as the Prime Minister of Manchukuo.

description.zh-cn: 1924年北洋军阀中直系与奉系之间爆发的第二次战争。
description.en: The second war that broke out in 1924 between the Zhili and Fengtian cliques of the Beiyang warlords.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国奉系军阀将领，后发动反奉兵变。
description.en: A general of the Fengtian clique in the Republic of China, who later launched a rebellion against the clique.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国奉系军阀将领。
description.en: A general of the Fengtian clique in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国奉系军阀将领。
description.en: A general of the Fengtian clique in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国奉系军阀将领。
description.en: A general of the Fengtian clique in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1928年日本关东军策划的、针对奉系军阀首领张作霖的暗杀事件。
description.en: An assassination event in 1928 planned by the Japanese Kwantung Army targeting Zhang Zuolin, the leader of the Fengtian clique.

description.zh-cn: 张学良宣布东三省服从国民政府，改悬青天白日满地红旗的事件，标志着北伐的完成和中国名义上的统一。
description.en: The event where Zhang Xueliang announced the allegiance of the Three Northeastern Provinces to the Nationalist Government and changed the flag, marking the completion of the Northern Expedition and the nominal unification of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国训政时期的中央政府与最高行政机关。
description.en: The central government and highest administrative body of the Republic of China during the Tutelage Period.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期吉林省的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative body of Jilin Province during the Republic of China era.

description.zh-cn: 由张作相于1929年创办的大学。
description.en: A university founded by Zhang Zuoxiang in 1929.

description.zh-cn: 日本关东军在中国东北蓄意制造并发动的一场侵华战争，是日本帝国主义侵华的开端。
description.en: An invasion of China deliberately staged and launched by the Japanese Kwantung Army in Northeast China, marking the beginning of Japanese imperialist aggression against China.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家，在20世纪上半叶对中国进行了侵略。
description.en: An East Asian country that invaded China in the first half of the 20th century.

description.zh-cn: 日本在中国东北地区建立的傀儡政权。
description.en: A puppet state established by Japan in Northeast China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家及军事家，曾任中华民国总统及国民政府主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician and military leader who served as the President of the Republic of China and Chairman of the Nationalist Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事人物，曾任吉林省政府主席。
description.en: A military figure of the Republic of China who served as the Chairman of the Jilin Provincial Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋军阀时期，以奉天省（今辽宁省）为中心，由张作霖建立的军事政治集团。
description.en: A military and political faction during the Warlord Era of the Republic of China, centered in Fengtian Province (modern-day Liaoning) and established by Zhang Zuolin.

description.zh-cn: 1925年至1947年中华民国的国家军队。
description.en: The national army of the Republic of China from 1925 to 1947.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，张作相的亲戚。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China and a relative of Zhang Zuoxiang.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的创建政党之一。
description.en: One of the founding political parties of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 辽宁省锦州市下辖的县，是张作相的出生地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Jinzhou, Liaoning Province, and the birthplace of Zhang Zuoxiang.

description.zh-cn: 张作相与张作霖同姓，结义为兄弟，早年共同组织“保险队”。
description.en: Zhang Zuoxiang and Zhang Zuolin shared the same surname and became sworn brothers, jointly organizing a 'protection squad' in their early years.

description.zh-cn: 张作相长期在张作霖麾下任职，是奉系军阀的核心人物之一。
description.en: Zhang Zuoxiang served under Zhang Zuolin for a long time and was one of the core figures of the Fengtian clique.

description.zh-cn: 1902年被招安前，与张作霖一同投身绿林，组织“保险队”。
description.en: Before being recruited by the government in 1902, he joined the Green Forest bandits with Zhang Zuolin and organized a 'protection squad'.

description.zh-cn: 在担任东三省总督期间创设了奉天讲武堂。
description.en: He founded the Fengtian Military Academy while serving as the Governor-General of the Three Northeastern Provinces.

description.zh-cn: 曾为奉天讲武堂第一期学生。
description.en: Was a student in the first class of the Fengtian Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 1917年，与孙烈臣共同镇压了宗社党的清朝复辟起义。
description.en: In 1917, along with Sun Liechen, he suppressed the Qing restoration uprising by the Royalist Party.

description.zh-cn: 阻止了冯德麟、汤玉麟的反张作霖阴谋。
description.en: He thwarted the anti-Zhang Zuolin conspiracy of Feng Delin and Tang Yulin.

description.zh-cn: 阻止了冯德麟、汤玉麟的反张作霖阴谋。
description.en: He thwarted the anti-Zhang Zuolin conspiracy of Feng Delin and Tang Yulin.

description.zh-cn: 在任驻关内奉军总司令期间，提拔了自己在东北讲武堂培养起来的张学良。
description.en: During his tenure as the commander-in-chief of the Fengtian army stationed inside the Great Wall, he promoted Zhang Xueliang, whom he had trained at the Northeast Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 在第一次直奉战争中，率东路军支援被直系击败的、领导西路的张景惠。
description.en: During the First Zhili-Fengtian War, he led the eastern route army to support Zhang Jinghui, the commander of the western route army, who had been defeated by the Zhili clique.

description.zh-cn: 在郭松龄叛乱后，张作相主张宽大处理叛乱士卒，与主张严惩的吴俊升、杨宇霆意见相左。
description.en: After Guo Songling's rebellion, Zhang Zuoxiang advocated for lenient treatment of the rebellious soldiers, opposing Wu Junsheng and Yang Yuting who called for severe punishment.

description.zh-cn: 在郭松龄叛乱后，张作相主张宽大处理叛乱士卒，与主张严惩的吴俊升、杨宇霆意见相左。
description.en: After Guo Songling's rebellion, Zhang Zuoxiang advocated for lenient treatment of the rebellious soldiers, opposing Wu Junsheng and Yang Yuting who called for severe punishment.

description.zh-cn: 皇姑屯事件导致张作霖身亡，其子张学良得以继位。
description.en: The Huanggutun Incident led to the death of Zhang Zuolin, allowing his son Zhang Xueliang to succeed him.

description.zh-cn: 皇姑屯事件后，拥立张学良继位，并担任其东北边防军副司令长官。
description.en: After the Huanggutun Incident, he supported Zhang Xueliang as the successor and served as his Deputy Commander of the Northeast Border Defense Army.

description.zh-cn: 拥立张学良后，推动东北易帜，名义上归顺国民政府。
description.en: After supporting Zhang Xueliang's succession, he promoted the Northeast Flag Replacement, nominally aligning with the Nationalist Government.

description.zh-cn: 在担任吉林省政府主席期间创办了吉林省立大学，并任首任校长。
description.en: While serving as Chairman of the Jilin Provincial Government, he founded Jilin Provincial University and served as its first president.

description.zh-cn: 九一八事变后，张作相辞去吉林省政府主席等职务。
description.en: After the Mukden Incident, Zhang Zuoxiang resigned from his position as Chairman of the Jilin Provincial Government.

description.zh-cn: 拒绝了日本方面邀请其出任“满洲国”要职的请求。
description.en: He refused the Japanese invitation to serve in a key position in Manchukuo.

description.zh-cn: 曾邀请张作相担任总统府国策顾问，但被张作相拒绝。
description.en: He once invited Zhang Zuoxiang to serve as a National Policy Advisor to the Presidential Office, but was refused.

description.zh-cn: 在解放军于锦州俘获张作相后，共产党方面决定将其释放并礼送到天津。
description.en: After Zhang Zuoxiang was captured by the PLA in Jinzhou, the Communist Party decided to release him and escort him to Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 张作相接替病逝的孙烈臣出任吉林督军。
description.en: Zhang Zuoxiang succeeded the deceased Sun Liechen as the Military Governor of Jilin.

description.zh-cn: 丁超接替张作相出任吉林省政府主席。
description.en: Ding Chao succeeded Zhang Zuoxiang as the Chairman of the Jilin Provincial Government.

description.zh-cn: 张作相是奉系军阀的核心人物之一，先后在清末新军和北洋陆军中任职。
description.en: Zhang Zuoxiang was a core figure of the Fengtian clique, serving in the New Army of the late Qing Dynasty and the Beiyang Army.

position.zh-cn: 吉林省党部指导委员会主任委员
position.en: Chairman of the Jilin Provincial Party Headquarters Steering Committee
